errors.error_description: The README suggests using a non-existent context menu option 'Disable sync' to exclude a show from auto-update.
correction_candidates: The correct context menu option is `Exclude from library update`.
The correct context menu option is `Netflix: Maintenance -> Exclude from sync`.
The correct context menu option is `Manage -> Exclude from auto update`.
The correct context menu option is `Exclude from auto update`.
errors.golden_answer: The correct context menu option is `Exclude from auto update`.
